summary: Addressing and pausing uncomfortable or inappropriate conversations to ensure all participants feel respected and comfortable, especially when sensitive themes are involved
name: Manage Uncomfortable Conversations

conversations.facetValue: It's important to recognize and address uncomfortable conversations, especially when topics may be sensitive or inappropriate, such as in the case of Manny Santos and the öğn jokes, by taking a break to reflect on one's comfort levels and thoughts.
